textBeforeTable: Machine washable. The plush Bunny Slippers are a soft reminder of storybook rabbits. Made of soft polyester fabric and a 1" foam-rubber no-slip bottom, the indoor slippers will keep your feet warm and cozy throughout the seasons. In the kids bunny slippers, sized for kids of all ages, adults and children alike are wrapped in cuddly comfort.
